name: Haunting Grounds
description:
Team Pentacles' entry to the FemDev GameJam 2022 with the theme:

Magic

How to play: 

Use  WASD to move around

Attacks are automatic

Survive as long as possible

The Team behind Haunting Grounds:

Janna (twitter, instagram, artstation): Game Art - Environment Assets, UI

Anne-Marie (portfolio 1, 2, 3,  instagram): 2D/ 3D Art, Story, Character Design

Sarah (twitter): Project Management, Engine Integration

Marcel (twitter): Programming

Yannik (twitter): Programming

This game was made in 44 hours. We wanted to add more, but time was short!

The Story behind:

Brandolf? - a creature half man, half raven. In his past he lost his life and love, but got revived as the messenger between the world of the death and the world of the living. With his powers he travels the world to help the people to defend against resentful spirits.

But there are ghosts he can not escape from. The ghosts of his past. the men he killed in battle, and his beloved. 'They come in waves when the blue moon shines. Will they haunt him forever or can he stand against them?
